duties_responsibilities.duty: Perform targeted outbound prospecting to find new customers and create new sales opportunities.
Qualify the right customers and partner closely with experienced sales team members to execute on sales opportunities.
Observe and learn the full sales process, pitch a vision, and create interest among prospects and customers within the healthcare industry.
Partner with experienced sales team members to learn, execute, and grow sales pipeline.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Business, Sales or a related field
